name: social-media-publisher
description: Publish pictures and texts to social media platforms, e.g. douyin, toutiao, kuaishou, xiaohongshu, weibo, baijiahao, bilibili, qzone.
author: Hongjian Li

scripts.start: node media.js; node login.js; node douyin.js; node toutiao.js; node kuaishou.js; node xiaohongshu.js; node weibo.js; node baijiahao.js; node bilibili.js; node qzone.js;
